credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Study of an old marble fountain
medium:
Pen and brown ink with brown wash and traces of graphite
Support: off-white laid paper on secondary paper support
description:
Study of a fountain. Inscription at top: "Veduta della fontana antica di marmo./ La circonferenza della tazza sono palmi dieci e once nove/ suo diametro palmi 3".
Translation: "View of an old marble fountain. The circumference of the bowl is ten palms and nine once. Its diameter three palms."
name: Drawing
